Amazing Aircraft, One Manufacturer

Introducing our collection of amazing aircraft for all purposes, classified in different headings!

Mods used: B9 Aerospace pack

Edited July 29, 2013 by SpaceToad
Added Embed for imgur, changed title as it is now a collection.
I'm really intrigued, but your pictures don't appear to be working.
Thank you! I just noticed. I am using Imgur but I am not sure why it does that... If you want, the album link is http://imgur.com/a/IWYQd
That's a really cool little plane! I always like designs with somewhat unconventional engine placement.

Thanks! I had made this primarily as a test because all my spaceplanes failed until I learned some skill about design. the engines, definitely unconventional.

Edited July 29, 2013 by SpaceToad
Punctuation.
You have to put the image links in the codes, not the website url. Also, I was wondering, how does it fly with the COM so far back?
